sentence.Network_en: North American literature is the main theme of this year's festival.
sentence.Network_cn: 北美文学是今年艺术节的主题。

sentence.Network_en: In their geography class, the children are doing a special project on North American Indians.
sentence.Network_cn: 在地理课上, 孩子们正在做一个有关北美印第安人的特别作业.

sentence.Network_en: The United States covers a large part of the North American continent.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国占据了北美大陆的大部分地区.
